articles.author: Megan Marples, CNN
articles.title: Sleep duration matters for heart health, according to new recommendations - CNN
articles.description: Sleep duration was added to the American Heart Association's "Life's Essential 8," a questionnaire that measure's a person's heart health.

articles.author: Anders Hagstrom
articles.title: Woody Williams, America's last World War II Medal of Honor recipient, dies - Fox News
articles.description: Hershel "Woody" Williams, 98, passed away while surrounded by his family on Wednesday. He was America's last surviving Medal of Honor recipient from World War II.
articles.content:
Hershel "Woody" Williams, America's last surviving World War II veteran to have received a Medal of Honor, passed away surrounded by family on Wednesday morning.
Williams, 98, was the last of the 47… [+2620 chars]

articles.author: Ryan O'Hanlon
articles.title: New Chelsea owner Todd Boehly may want to trade players, but here's why it doesn't happen in soccer - ESPN
articles.description: Trading players in the MLB, NBA and other American sports is commonplace. But new Chelsea owner Todd Boehly won't be able to conduct transfer business in the same way.
articles.content:
A consortium led by Los Angeles Dodgers part-owner Todd Boehly has completed its takeover of Chelsea in a deal worth up to £4.25 billion. Adam Davy/PA Images via Getty Images
